comment: This is a great professor! Very helpful. A little misunderstood at first but he is very kind. Likes to chat and peak your interest. Awesome professor.

This professor does not show you how to work the problems. You have to figure that out and without the use of the textbook because he does not go by it. We had to do study groups on weekends and after class to get an idea of what the material was about. When we got stuck he would mock us. He does not have the patience to teach. Do not take him.

Great Professor and very good at helping you with problems you might have so speak up.  A solid foundation in Statics is needed for his course too.  If you can do the homework then you can do the tests.  I learned a lot from this class! Summer 2010

His teachng style usually scares students off but as long as you come to class, take notes, and DO HOMEWORK, the class is not hard. Tests are entirely homework material, sometimes he puts a question relating to a theory that he barely mentions in class. Also prepare for homework that takes hours to complete!
Awesome Prof.  Very hard and demanding...but you are going to be an engineer..duh.  Fair with grading.  DO HOMEWORK AND COME TO CLASS
He knows his subject, overall I enjoyed the class.  I got an A but it was not easy to get.  Only take him if you are an "A" student and do your homework and you should go to every class.

This class is suposed to be an "INTRODUCTORY" class. but this man teaches like we are on the same level with him. i had to withdraw from the class. it was a waiste of time, money and effort. RUN IF YOU ARE A "STUDENT" AND YOU WANT TO "LEARN" What you dont have a clue about. dont even waiste ur money. trust me on this. look for another professor.
Knows what he teaches BUT!!! HE FORGOT THAT WE ARE STUDENTS!!! Super Fast pace and get mad sometimes. ONLY ONE WHO TEACHES THIS SUBJECT!!!
